name: 高等分析化學研究
description: The goal of this course is to familiarize students with important chemical species that may exist in plastics, paints, natural and synthetic fibers in different matrices, along with their analyses using different analytical methods.
goals: The goal of this course is to familiarize students with important chemical species that may exist in plastics, paints, natural and synthetic fibers in different matrices, along with their analyses using different analytical methods.
syllabus:
1\. Contents regarding raw plastic materials will be discussed from week 1 to 3.  
2\. Contents regarding paints will be discussed from week 4 to 9.  
3\. Contents regarding natural fibers will be covered from week 10 to 11.  
4\. Contents regarding spectroscopic techniques will be discussed from week12 to 15.  
5\. Contents regarding pyrolytic and mass spectrometry will be discussed from Week 16 to 19.
